title: Freezing in champion select cost me my series.
body:
^^ 
I feel really cheated; am I just going to have to grind my way back up to 100 LP again?

replies.body:
It's unfortunate that you lost your series due to the issue during champ select. Freezes here are often caused by an unstable connection to the servers. When your connection falls off during champ select, the server doesn't get a response from you and is not able to verify you're connected anymore. Most of the time these issues can be resolved by the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

League points and match history cannot be modified after they've been recorded. The system was designed this way to prevent corruption. Often times losing a series doesn't put you down to 0 LP and sometimes it only takes one or two wins to enter your series again. I encourage you to live by your summoner name and Never Give up! :)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher and hitting "Repair". Let us know if it helps or not.
